programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Coisas bonitas
programme.desc: Beautiful Things é uma viagem ao nosso consumo obsessivo. Os muitos objetos que acumulamos e que acreditamos serem essenciais começam sua jornada de produção em locais industriais e científicos isolados e silenciosos.

programme.title: The Fabulist
programme.desc: Neste documentário inspirador e caloroso, Sandi Marx, uma agente de talentos veterana de Hollywood decide iniciar uma nova carreira como humorista de stand-up, agora que se confronta com o declínio da saúde.

programme.title: Nose
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez num documentário, a prestigiada Casa de Dior abriu as suas portas para mostrar as maravilhas da criação de perfumes. Viajantes no coração, Arthur de Kersauson e Clément Beauvais seguiram François Demachy durante dois anos e mais de 14 países, de Grasse ao outro lado do mundo, na sua busca de inspiração e das matérias-primas mais preciosas.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, O Herói Inesperado
programme.desc: Esta é a história de uma pessoa normal que faz coisas extraordinárias. Alguém que persegue e conquista triunfos cuidando dos pequenos detalhes, porque estes são, afinal, os que fazem dele um futebolista diferente. Todos conhecemos Iniesta, o mágico da bola que conquistou dois triples campeonatos com o Barça e levantou a Copa do Mundo com a seleção espanhola. E sim, é claro que conhecemos os seus grandes momentos desportivos. Mas quem está por trás dessa estrela mundial do desporto?

programme.title: A minha Decisão, por Andrés Iniesta
programme.desc: "São poucas as pessoas que sabem o que aconteceu quando me lesionei. Poucas sabem que tive de tomar uma decisão de enorme importância. Valia a pena continuar a jogar, ou estava na altura de parar?" Um documentário revelador sobre o lendário médio, Andrés Iniesta, quando enfrenta uma decisão crucial após uma lesão que ameaça a sua carreira. A história de um amor de longa data pelo futebol, sob a ameaça de uma situação cruel e inevitável.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Tenerife | La Palma
programme.desc: A aventura continua em Tenerife, com uma primeira prova que terá os impressionantes Acantilados de los Gigantes como pano de fundo e um catamarã e uma corrida de estafetas em caiaques como protagonistas para obter o máximo de "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. As equipas poderão obter mais objetos na Candelaria, no seu Conjunto Monumental de los Menceyes e na misteriosa Cueva del Viento. Uma nova surpresa final espera aí pelas equipas...

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal é uma história sobre vontade, sonhos, determinação, fé, rebelião, coragem e amor. O filme convida-nos a uma jornada pelos diferentes mundos e altamente variados de Sadio - desde a vida rural numa pequena aldeia no extremo sul de Senegal até aos holofotes do futebol mundial jogando pelo Liverpool FC, vencendo as Ligas dos Campeões como número 10 e ganhando a audiência mundial. A Interação de animações, cenas de documentário, um conjunto diversificado de imagens detalhadas e de arquivo dá vida ao passado de Sadio e cria um excitante enredo cheio de emoções.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Gomera | El Hierro
programme.desc: A viagem continua em La Gomera, com uma primeira prova no frondoso Parque Nacional de Garajonay, onde terão de mostrar como se conseguem orientar às cegas para obter "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. Daí, "saltarão" para o Valle Gran Rey para fazer outro tipo de salto, o salto do pastor, uma técnica utilizada pelos antigos habitantes da ilha para se deslocarem em terrenos montanhosos, que lhes permitirá obter mais "objetos". Tudo o que foi conquistado pelos participantes será posto em jogo na Playa del Inglés, onde a força e a coordenação de cada equipa serão fundamentais no final desta etapa.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Megacities é um documentário sobre as favelas de quatro cidades metropolitanas diferentes: Bombaim, Cidade do México, Moscou e Nova York. O filme é um relato em doze episódios sobre pessoas que lutam para sobreviver com desenvoltura, humor e dignidade.

programme.title: Overdosed
programme.desc: O inquietante turbilhão da mortífera crise dos opiácios nos EUA é revelado na pequena cidade rural de Petersburg, West Virginia, o estado mais duramente afetado por esta epidemia.

programme.title: The Fabulist
programme.desc: Neste documentário inspirador e caloroso, Sandi Marx, uma agente de talentos veterana de Hollywood decide iniciar uma nova carreira como humorista de stand-up, agora que se confronta com o declínio da saúde.

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Liderada por Rafa Nadal, a seleção espanhola era a favorita deste ano até sofrer um sério revés. O jogador número dois da equipa, Roberto Bautista, teve de deixar a disputa para voltar à sua cidade natal e ficar ao lado do pai nas últimas horas da sua vida. Sem o Bautista, Nadal e Feliciano López conseguiram heroicamente levar a equipa à final. Mas então veio a notícia que emocionou os fãs de ténis em todo o mundo: Bautista, após o funeral do seu pai, está de volta à competição e pronto para jogar. Unidos mais uma vez, os espanhóis lutam pela vitória na grande final, onde algo muito além do ténis está em jogo.

programme.title: Bojan, por trás do sorriso
programme.desc: Depois de retirar-se dos relvados aos 32 anos, Bojan Krkic decide contar a sua história. Através de uma conversa com o psicanalista que o tratou quando da sua estreia com o FC Barcelona aos 16 anos, o documentário explora as dificuldades enfrentadas por um talento precoce e sensível no mundo cruel do futebol. Jogadores que testemunharam a sua carreira de perto, tais como Thierry Henry, Andrés Iniesta e Zlatan Ibrahimovic, partilham o seu ponto de vista sobre Bojan, o futebolista, e Bojan, a pessoa, e refletem sobre a pressão, saúde mental e gestão de expetativas.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Fast Forward - Episode 1 - 5
programme.desc: Fusão Nuclear | Corpos Biónicos | Limpadores do Espaço | Carne Criada em Laboratório | Blockchain, protocolo da confiança

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carmen Arce, "Kubalita", guarda-redes da primeira seleção nacional feminina espanhola, parte de Valencia para Barcelona para conhecer Alexia Putellas, vencedora da Liga dos Campeões da UEFA e da Supertaça Europeia, e Viktoria Adrianova, ambas jogadoras do FC Barcelona. Antes do encontro, Alexia confessa não ser tão impaciente como outrora, Viky emociona-se ao recordar a sua lesão e Kubalita afirma que elas não se esconderam, apesar de os políticos e os meios de comunicação terem subestimado a sua atividade. Assim que se reuniram, trocaram impressões sobre o momento atual do futebol feminino.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: Socorro Evolution
programme.desc: Uma equipa de embaixadores da vida natural marinha prepara-se para uma grande aventura do arquipélago de Revillagigedo do México, Património da UNESCO. Os mergulhadores de renome internacional mostram-nos a beleza da forma como os homens pode explorar a vida marinha ao mesmo tempo que a conservam.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Tenerife | La Palma
programme.desc: A aventura continua em Tenerife, com uma primeira prova que terá os impressionantes Acantilados de los Gigantes como pano de fundo e um catamarã e uma corrida de estafetas em caiaques como protagonistas para obter o máximo de "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. As equipas poderão obter mais objetos na Candelaria, no seu Conjunto Monumental de los Menceyes e na misteriosa Cueva del Viento. Uma nova surpresa final espera aí pelas equipas...

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: The Fabulist
programme.desc: Neste documentário inspirador e caloroso, Sandi Marx, uma agente de talentos veterana de Hollywood decide iniciar uma nova carreira como humorista de stand-up, agora que se confronta com o declínio da saúde.

programme.title: Anuktatop: The Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Este filme belo e híbrido navega entre o documentário e a ficção para ilustrar, a partir do imaginário dos Wayana, as mudanças enfrentadas por esta comunidade indígena que vive entre a Guiana Francesa e o Suriname.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 5-6
programme.desc: Episódio 5 - La Palma | Episódio 6 - El Hierro and La Gomera

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Big Boys Gone Bananas!*
programme.desc: Para lançar um documentário que desvenda a implementação de agrotóxicos proibidos nas plantações de banana da América Central, dois cineastas terão de enfrentar a oposição de uma das maiores multinacionais agrícolas.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Maravilhosos perdedores: um mundo diferente
programme.desc: Por trás das equipas de elite do ciclismo mundial, há lutadores desconhecidos, verdadeiros heróis do ciclismo que caem, levantam-se e voltam. Uma odisséia que revela um olhar incomum sobre os “maravilhosos perdedores”, aqueles que sacrificam as suas carreiras profissionais pela glória dos seus companheiros de equipa.O que os motiva a continuar, a pedalar no absoluto anonimato, num dos desportos mais exigentes física e psicologicamente? Seguimos estes “Sancho Pança” do ciclismo profissional durante 7 anos e descobrimos a vida, até então invisível, destes homens, sem os quais as equipas profissionais ficariam sem pódio, nem troféu.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: Barcelona: Surf Destination
programme.desc: Em "Barcelona: Surf Destination", Ítalo Ferreira, o primeiro campeão olímpico de surf, aceita o convite do seu amigo Alex Vilalta e viaja para Barcelona para explorar a costa catalã e conhecer a comunidade de surfistas que mantém o espírito do surf aceso neste reduto mediterrâneo. Neste documentário de aventuras repletas de sol, somos convidados a partir numas férias com amigos que se reúnem para tagarelar e entregar-se àquilo que os apaixona: o surf.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: In The Turn

The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: Live DJ Set with Gotis
programme.desc: GOTIS brings her groovy and underground sound to LDS on Clubbing TV. Expect a set that blends the warmth of house, the hypnotic loops of techno, and the rhythms of breakbeat, creating an authentic and captivating experience. With roots in the Parisian scene and a passion for merging styles, GOTIS crafts a musical journey that defies conventions. Tune in to LDS for a set that promises both depth and energy.

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: Who doesn't love Sweet Kisses? Join Chef Kimberly Lallouz as she showers them on her multi-course feast all laid out in One Big Recipe. Her Spicy Cornbread gets the first peck with lip-smacking Honey Butter. Then, it's a berry... nice smooch for a seared rare Duck Breast appetizer with Cherries and Walnuts. Avocado Honeydew Gazpacho follows, silky and savoury, with just a gentle sugary buss from the melon, it's a chilled soup gorgeously garnished with crostini and mascarpone. Citrus smooches Salmon on the main course, butter basted and presented with shattered dried citrus shards sprinkled over top and Basmati with Cranberries and Rice Vinegar alongside. Anyone can do it! It's all in the...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.desc: Who doesn't love Sweet Kisses? Join Chef Kimberly Lallouz as she showers them on her multi-course feast all laid out in One Big Recipe. Her Spicy Cornbread gets the first peck with lip-smacking Honey Butter. Then, it's a berry... nice smooch for a seared rare Duck Breast appetizer with Cherries and Walnuts. Avocado Honeydew Gazpacho follows, silky and savoury, with just a gentle sugary buss from the melon, it's a chilled soup gorgeously garnished with crostini and mascarpone. Citrus smooches Salmon on the main course, butter basted and presented with shattered dried citrus shards sprinkled over top and Basmati with Cranberries and Rice Vinegar alongside. Anyone can do it! programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, and explores the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and indulges in water sports.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Parathas may have originated in Peshawar but they have now become one of the most popular dishes

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex uncovers the secret behind the irresistible Shahi Dal at Amritsar’s iconic eating joint, Kesar Da Dhaba.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Watch a musical instrument powered by sea waves and learn how glassware was made in Roman era. This and more with Alexandra in Zadar episode.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Heritage Portugal, Portugal
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: The cuisine of Punjab is rich in flavour because it is farm-to-fork and still employs traditional cooking methods such as cooking in a charcoal oven.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra in this episode explores Plitvice, where she visits a national park, interacts with locals, tastes local wine and then leaves for Zagreb.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Spas Chiva Som, Thailand
programme.desc: From an underwater therapy to a massage that detoxes internal organs, Jamie Srubis tries varied spa treatments at the Chiva Som resort in Thailand.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets a Nawab in Lucknow, who shows her how to make Gosht Mawazad, a decadent Awadhi dish with mutton and dry fruits.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: On a short break in Belfast, the capital of Northern Ireland, Olivia, an avid traveller, finds herself infected by the energy of the city at a traditional Victorian market. At the city’s main attractions like Belfast City Hall and Belfast Castle, she gets to know its history. She also visits the Ulster Museum, which tells her stories about the Egyptians in Ireland, and Titanic Belfast, which makes the grand ship and its downfall come alive for her.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya visits Oriole Villas where she explores Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish, witnesses a traditional dance performance, followed by a visit to Galapath temple and Sea turtle hatchery the next day and ends the day with a visit to a water sport center.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets the descendants of the royal families of Hyderabad and Lucknow, and they tell her about the culture and cuisine of both kingdoms.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Stretching almost 25 kms along the Omani coastline, Muscat combines new world glamour and old-world charm to give visitors a taste of real Arabia.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Cologne is all things romantic from the chocolate museum to its perfume shop. It is a city in love with life, one that knows how to have a good time.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Once a fishing village and now a mega town full of sky scrapers and modern high rise buildings. Welcome to the biggest emirate of the United Arab Emirates - Dubai.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, and explores the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and indulges in water sports.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a traditional Awadhi korma to Rewa’s famous Mutton Bandhwesh, Alex explores the vast and complex culinary culture of India’s royal kitchens.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alex continues her journey in Croatia, exploring Brac and Spilit. Starting with quad biking and windsurfing in the coastal town of Barc, she later explores the port city of Split with is beauty.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Parathas may have originated in Peshawar but they have now become one of the most popular dishes

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List

programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Every year 150,000 petrol heads travel to the Nevada dessert to attend the SEMA in Las Vegas, the biggest and best-known tuning exhibition in the world. Among them is motoring journalist Kati. She meets with tuning expert Dirk Hattenh.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: The SEMA Show in Las Vegas is the biggest and best-known tuning exhibition in the world. From complexly rebuilt show cars to giant off-road monster trucks: Anything is represented here.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: There is hardly anything that inspires Ola Stenegard, Chief Designer at BMW Motorrad, as much as his trips through California. On a creative expedition through Los Angeles, he meets world-famous legends from the motorcycle industry.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape won't win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 was not the fastest on the street but was ready for water.

programme.title: Motorbike TV
programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 Motorbike TV: Episode 6: Motorcycle Olympics Finale
programme.desc: In the final episode of season 2 of Motorbike TV, Graham Hoskins, Sam Farah and Tom Woodrows head underground in the last part of Tales from the Trails. In 10-in-10 Graham and Charley Boorman talk to Bruce Smart, and ask him the big question on everyone’s lips: “Why aren’t you in season 2?” Graham and Lara Small swap bikes in the second part of Ducati vs Ducati, and we round out the season with the final challenge of the Motorcycle Olympics where the last 3 competitors take part in a head-to-head slalom race.

programme.title: Dakar 2023: Full Review
programme.desc: Check out all of the highlights from the 2023 edition of the Dakar Rally, held in Saudi Arabia and the 45th edition of the Dakar Rally organized by Amaury Sport Organisation. The event took place between 31 December 2022 and 15 January 2023. This is the fourth time Saudi Arabia has hosted the event.

programme.title: TCR South America
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E07 TCR South America - San Juan: Race 2
programme.desc: Watch the second race of the 2024 TCR South America championship round in San Juan, Argentina.

programme.title: Adrian Newey Confirmed - Are Aston Martin Set for F1 Success?
programme.desc: Despite it being possibly F1's worst kept secret in recent years, today Aston Martin announced that Adrian Newey will join the F1 team, starting March 2025 as Managing Technical Partner as well a shareholder - for an eye-watering amount of money too. But does Adrian Newey complete Lawrence Stroll's dream lineup for Aston Martin to succeed in F1 and fight for championship titles? Jon Noble and Ben Hunt chat at Aston's facilities.

programme.title: 2024 Le Mans 24hrs Analysis - Ferrari Rain Supreme
programme.desc: The 92nd running of the 24 Hours of Le Mans did not disappoint, after heavy rain and some controversial stewarding, the #50 Ferrari of Miguel Molina, Antonio Fuoco and Nicklas Nielsen triumphed over the #7 Toyota of Kamui Kobayashi, Nyck de Vries and Jose Maria Lopez to take their second-consecutive win for the prancing horse. Gary Watkins joins Steph Wentworth to review all the action across the famous race, including a full breakdown of all the major Hypercar factories, reviews of the LMP2 and LMGT3 classes, specific moments and more.

programme.title: Behind the Scenes of A2RL’s Autonomous Racing
programme.desc: We've gone over how A2RL's autonomous cars work (if you haven't seen our previous video, check it out below), but what happened when the cars finally hit the track to race? From 8 cars running in qualifying, to racing against ex-F1 driver Daniil Kyvat, to the final 4-car race, the cars were certainly put through their paces. We sent Alex Goy to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to see just how A2RL's autonomous cars got on at their first major event.

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Alaska, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions. The Tour’s mission is to inspire people to forge a deeper bond with Mother Nature.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Women
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers through 650 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 000m of climbing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2017 - Preaseason Show incl. FWT Qualifier Hakuba (JPN)
programme.desc: Steep powder slopes, spectacular off-piste runs, and awe-inspiring drops from huge cliffs: since 2008, the world’s leading freeride skiers and snowboarders have fought for the World Championship titles of the Freeride World Tour (FWT) every year.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefé in Spain. Get ready for the world's top kiteboarders!

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship #1
programme.desc: Today we´re joining the World Downhill Skateboarding & Luge Championship in Erzincan, Turkey. Nestled in the heart of Eastern Anatolia, Erzincan’s breathtaking landscapes provide a stunning backdrop for this adrenaline-fueled competition.

programme.title: LAAX Highline World Championships 2024
programme.desc: The LAAX Highline World Championships 2024 will take place from July 17th to 21st in Laax, Switzerland, at the legendary GALAAXY on the summit of Crap Sogn Gion (2252m). The competition consists of two disciplines: Freestyle and Speed Highline.

programme.title: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024
programme.desc: World’s biggest long-distance triathlon: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024July 7th, 2024The world’s best athletes will conquer the traditional triathlon distance of 3.8 km swimming, 180 km cycling and 42.2 km running through the district of Roth in Bavaria, Germany.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: Snow Bike Festival 2017 - Gstaad (SUI)
programme.desc: The Snow Bike Festival is Europe’s “Winter Festival of Snow Biking”. The third edition of the innovative snow-bike event will take place at Gstaad, Switzerland, from January 19 to 22, 2017.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge - World Championships 2017 - Vatra Dornai (ROM)
programme.desc: In the winter of 2016/17, the world’s best natural track lugers compete at the World Cup and the World Championships of the “Fédération Internationale de Luge de Course” (FIL).

programme.title: Mystic Skate Cup 2024
programme.desc: At the end of June, the 29th annual of the legendary Mystic sk8 Cup took place in Prague – Štvanice island. In these historical records, you can see that the 30th anniversary is approaching, but already now, there was a lot to see and it was an incredible spectacle.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court
programme.desc: For the fourth year running Hamburg will host a Queen & King of the Court tournament. From May 30 till June 2nd the best of the best will travel once again to the harbor city on the Elbe River to fight for the titles of Queens and Kings of Hamburg.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2
programme.desc: Welcome from WES Round 1 and 2 in Trentino, Alto Garda, for the UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Season Opener. First time ever in the astonishing Dolomites mountain area in northern Italy, well-known for its tradition in e-biking, MTB and cyclo-tourism.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: Episode 37
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 37

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing

programme.title: Xtreme Verbier - 20-jähriges Jubiläum - Teil 2
programme.desc: Verbier - seit vielen Jahren eine der besten Off-Piste-Locations der Welt und Austragungsort des legendären Finales der Freeride World Tour, feierte das "Xtreme Verbier" sein 20-jähriges Jubiläum. Die steile und zerklüftete 500 Meter lange Felswand des Bec des Rosses war in den letzten zwei Jahrzehnten die Herausforderung für alle Rider - Zeit für einen Rückblick!

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Climbing + Unicycle
programme.desc: Climbing & Unicycling – World Records & Spectacular Climbing Routes. This 26-minute show brings together 3 extraordinary athletic achievements – a climbing record at famous El Capitan, a unicycle world record , and impressive climbing images!

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: Das Konzept ist einfach: Wer von Arholma im Norden aus als Erster Landsort im Süden erreicht, wird zum Sieger gekürt. Laufen und Schwimmen sind die einzigen Fortbewegungsarten. Es gibt keine Streckenführung und freie Wahl der Route.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Women - Alaska, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions. The Tour’s mission is to inspire people to forge a deeper bond with Mother Nature.

programme.title: Open Faces - Season Highlights
programme.desc: Today we present you the Highlights of the Open Faces Event, the chance for riders to qualify for the well-known Freeride World Tour. Junior riders as well as adults have the opportunity to show their skill to the judges.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022
programme.desc: Neusiedl am See, (AUT), April 27th to May 1st, 2022With 9 events on the calendar across Europe and South America, it is getting excited for Europe’s and America’s best freestyle windsurfing action!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 4 + 5
programme.desc: In today´s episode we go Down Under to the extrem water athletes in Australia. We´re oing to find out, who will win the Round 4 and 5 of the V8 Superboats Championship 2021.

programme.title: Episode 37
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 37

programme.title: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: Motorsurf World Championship #1
programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: The Golden Roof Challenge returns to the heart of Innsbruck, Austria for its big 20th anniversary!On May 18th, the world’s best Long Jumpers and Pole Vaulters will compete for important world ranking points in order to qualify for the Olympic Games in Paris!

programme.title: Best of Mountain Trail Running
programme.desc: It’s the longest, toughest and highest one-stage trail race in the Alps: Swiss Irontrail demands a great deal of the participants through Graubünden’s unique mountain scenery.

programme.title: Biggest Peak Project I
programme.desc: 200 years after the first ascent of Jungfrau summit (SUI); 150 years of Mammut, Europe’s biggest mountaineering outfitter and 100 years of Jungfraubahn – a “structure of the century”.

programme.title: Enfer & Paradis
programme.desc: Justine Dupont is on her way to be the world's best female surfer. Enfer & Paradis accompanies her in her everyday life as well as on the biggest wave in the world - Nazaré and offers insights behind the scenes of the first mixed surfing world championship.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - BMX Final
programme.desc: Simple Session wurde im Jahr 2000 ins Leben gerufen und hat sich von einem Kleinstadt-Wettbewerb zu einem der größten und renommiertesten BMX- und Skateboard-Wettbewerbe der Welt entwickelt. Die Simple Session 24 kehrt am 24.-25. August in ihre Heimatstadt Tartu zurück.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #2 Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Freeride World Tour 2020 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The second stage of the tour will revisit champagne powder paradise Kicking Horse near Golden, British Columbia (CAN).

programme.title: Episode 37
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 37

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: 4Islands - Croatia
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands will be slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending on Rab.

programme.title: Škoda Titan Desert Series - Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesport and the mystic deserts of Morocco, where Athletes are not only fighting nature, but also one of the hardest racetracks on the planet. The dunes… The navigation…. The suffering… The legend…. The desert! The Skoda Titan Desert Morocco.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship
programme.desc: This week we follow the worlds boldest Downhill-Skaters, racing down the turkish Mountinroads of Erincan. Be prepared for some narly turns on four wheels!

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP TwinTip Women Strapless Overall
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP TwinTip Women Strapless Overall

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2016/17 - Final - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.desc: In the winter of 2016/17, the world’s best natural track lugers compete at the World Cup and the World Championships of the “Fédération Internationale de Luge de Course” (FIL).

programme.title: Alaska or Bus´t - MTB Roadtrip - Athlete Profile Andrew Taylor (USA)
programme.desc: laska has always been a dream-riding destination for 28-year-old American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown Santa Cruz, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: Freeride Junior World Championship 2017 - Grandvalira (AND)
programme.desc: The Freeride Junior World Championships are held for the fifth time ever, and for the third time at Andorra’s freeriding hot spot Grandvalira. Skiers and snowboarders between 14 and 18 years from both sides of the Atlantic will join in.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2017 - Vallnord-Arcalis (AND)
programme.desc: Steep powder slopes, spectacular off-piste runs, and awe-inspiring drops from huge cliffs: since 2008, the world’s leading freeride skiers and snowboarders have fought for the World Championship titles of the Freeride World Tour (FWT) every year.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2017 - Chamonix (FRA) replacement show staged in Andorra
programme.desc: Steep powder slopes, spectacular off-piste runs, and awe-inspiring drops from huge cliffs: since 2008, the world’s leading freeride skiers and snowboarders have fought for the World Championship titles of the Freeride World Tour (FWT) every year.

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Women - Alaska, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions. The Tour’s mission is to inspire people to forge a deeper bond with Mother Nature.

programme.title: Open Faces - Season Highlights
programme.desc: Today we present you the Highlights of the Open Faces Event, the chance for riders to qualify for the well-known Freeride World Tour. Junior riders as well as adults have the opportunity to show their skill to the judges.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022
programme.desc: Neusiedl am See, (AUT), April 27th to May 1st, 2022With 9 events on the calendar across Europe and South America, it is getting excited for Europe’s and America’s best freestyle windsurfing action!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 4 + 5
programme.desc: In today´s episode we go Down Under to the extrem water athletes in Australia. We´re oing to find out, who will win the Round 4 and 5 of the V8 Superboats Championship 2021.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Kayak + Climbing
programme.desc: 1. Two mountaineers explore the “Place of Happiness”. Their goal is to climb the highest Monolith in Brazil in a one-day push. 2. Some of the world´s best kayakers gather for the descent of the Stikine River - the “Everest of whitewater”.

programme.title: Xtreme Verbier - 20-jähriges Jubiläum - Teil 1
programme.desc: Verbier - seit vielen Jahren eine der besten Off-Piste-Locations der Welt und Austragungsort des legendären Finales der Freeride World Tour, feierte das "Xtreme Verbier" sein 20-jähriges Jubiläum. Die steile und zerklüftete 500 Meter lange Felswand des Bec des Rosses war in den letzten zwei Jahrzehnten die Herausforderung für alle Rider - Zeit für einen Rückblick!

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge

programme.desc: Experience 24 minutes of adrenaline-fueled feats as Nicholi Rogatkin (USA) and Casey Brown (CAN) take viewers through the final highlight edit of the 2023 Swatch Nines Mountain Bike event at Germany's Green Hill Bikepark, held from the 14th to the 19th of August.

programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: Die Westwandroute mit ihrem langen Gletscheranflug durch den Circo de los Altares fühlt sich außergewöhnlich an. Dass es dem gesammten Team möglich war, mit dem Gleitschirm vom Gipfel zu starten, beweist ihr Können, sowohl als Bergsteiger als auch als Paraglider.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2024 - Best of MEN

programme.title: 5 Peaks Project
programme.desc: Famed Swiss mountain-runner Andreas Steindl (26) set a stunning new record: he ran up five four-thousand-metre peaks within 7 hours and 45 minutes – his kind of a perfect “nine-to-five” day in his “alpine office”.

programme.title: Dream Job

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands' Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the can't miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The Lightweight title is on the line as Sittichai looks to defend his title against #1 challenger Marat Grigorian. There is also a four-man lightweight tournament on the card.

programme.desc: This is heavyweight fighting at its best and bloodiest. Finnish muay thai champion Jarno Nurminen makes his mised martial art debut against Korean judo expert Sag Su Lee. And in one of the sport's best brawls, Roy Nelson goes toe-to-toe with Josh Curran.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Coming from a history of drinking heavily and drug abuse, Nick Burnham was able to turn his life around completely by prioritizing his MMA training. Now, at HK38, Nick is looking to take the Lightweight title away from Dauda Keita in a fight that goes the distance!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Josh Hopkins as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Transitioning from a professional ballet dancer to an MMA fighter and coach bring some interesting insights and tricks other athletes might not be aware of. Anthony Ford has a ""method to his madness"" when he trains other fighters.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Todd Johnston was a well known competitor in Martial Arts, and has since devoted his time to helping other aspiring fighters achieve their goals. Under Todd's tutelage, several Hard Knocks fighters have gone above and beyond what they set out to accomplish.
